chirptask.logic

Class FilterTasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • chirptask.logic.FilterTasks

  • public class FilterTasks
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is use to populate the task/hashtag/category list and will be use to display by DisplayView class.

      • processFilterDateParam

        public static java.util.Calendar processFilterDateParam(java.lang.String filter)
                                                 throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        Process the user date input and return an calendar object
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter date String
        Returns:
        The Calendar object that was parsed from filter string
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - If user did not enter ##/##
